original_text: “Whoever causes one of these little ones who believe in me to sin, it would be better for him if a great millstone were hung around his neck and he were thrown into the sea.
korean_text: 또 누구든지 나를 믿는 이 작은 자들 중 하나라도 실족하게 하면 차라리 연자맷돌이 그 목에 매여 바다에 던져지는 것이 나으리라

sentences.original_text: Whoever causes one of these little ones
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 이 어린 아이 중 하나를

sentences.original_text: who believe in me to sin,
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 믿는 자를 죄 짓게 하는 것이면

sentences.original_text: it would be better for him
if a great millstone were hung around his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 맷돌이 그 목에 달리는 것이 더 나으리라

sentences.original_text: and he were thrown into the sea.
